name: @subspace/reed-solomon-erasure.wasm
description: Rust implementation of read-solomon erasure-coding compiled to Web Assembly

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run compile-wasm && npm run compile && npm run copy-wasm && npm run minify
scripts.compile-wasm: wasm-pack build --release --out-dir wasm-build && cp wasm-build/reed_solomon_erasure_bg.wasm src/ && rm -rf wasm-build
